string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: The undergraduate population at PLU is ~3000
The graduate population at PLU is ~300
The female/male ratio at PLU is ~63:37
There are 27 countries represented at PLU
There are 38 states represented at PLU
The average class size at PLU is 20
The Student to Faculty ratio is 12:1
97% of students at PLU receive Financial Aid
The average Financial Aid package at PLU is $32,000
PLU was founded in 1890 by Bjug Harstad, PLU\'s 1st President
Pacific Lutheran University used to be called Pacific Lutheran College
Harstad Hall was the first building on campus, known as Old Main
In 1924, the 1st edition of the Mooring Mast (student newspaper) was printed
The first PLU football team was created in 1926 and was named the Greyhounds, then Gladiators, and now the Knights
Tingelstad Hall is the tallest building in Parkland
